page.title: 14INDUSTRY IN A-IN-M
page.content: Most of the heavy industry such as {cotton weaving, coal mining and metal {manufacturing}has moved away from this area,leaving the town with roughly three small industrial estates,Lockett road,Camp road, and Park lane.These are mainly storage and distribution depots.The only manufacturing carried out on a large scale is at, G.K.N.,Levertons,and Makerfield Springs.A small clothing manufacturer operates on Bolton road.The industrial development of the Three Sisters' area includes warehousing for Kwik-Save as well as Ro-Mix,a ready made cake firm.There are one or two other small manufacturing firms there.There are several scrap merchants and two wood yards.Most of the people of Ashton work in other towns which are within travelling distance.Ashton has therefore become a residential town.
